body:
Peace, Labor, May
Congratulations to everyone. Today is wonderful holiday of spring and labor.
I wish everyone to be peaceful and hardworking. 
Love May.

title: International Workers' Day

replies.body: Techinally yes, because we are working for points that get put into our grades. With those Grades you can get into good Colleges and get a successful job. We have to work for that so yeah, we are workers too lol.
